This package analyzes data of American Airlines flights departed from NYC in 2013.

## Installation

```{r, eval = F}
# first install the R package "devtools" if not installed
devtools::install_github("unimi-dse/531ababf")
```

## Usage

```{r, eval = F}
# load the package
require(flightsanalysis)
```

### Get data

The function `catch_data()` reads a .csv file from an URL and filters American Airlines data. Since the dataset is quite big, you might have to wait a bit for the download to be completed.
